description.value:
Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Force

Standard, At-Will

Reach 2

+19 vs AC; 2d8+6 damage plus 1d10 force damage, and the dragon slides the target 2 squares.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard, At-Will

Reach 2

+19 vs AC; 2d8+6 damage.

At-Will

Standard, At-Will

The dragon makes two claw attacks

At-Will

Immediate Reaction

Targets the triggering enemy

Trigger: When an enemy moves into an adjacent square, at-will

+18 vs Fortitude; 2d8+6 damage, and the target is knocked prone. Effect: The dragon shifts 1 square and flies 3 squares.

At-Will ✦ Charm

Minor 1/Round, At-Will

+16 vs Will; the dragon slides the target 1 square, and the target grants combat advantage until the end of the dragon's next turn. Effect: The dragon shifts 1 square.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Force

Standard, Recharge

Close blast 5

+18 vs Fortitude; 4d6+6 force damage, and the target is dazed (save ends). Miss: Half damage.

Encounter ✦ Force

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

Breath weapon recharges, and the dragon uses it

Encounter ✦ Fear

Standard, Encounter

Close burst 5

Targets enemies; +18 vs Will; the target is stunned until the end of the dragon's next turn. Aftereffect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).

At-Will ✦ Polymorph

Minor

The dragon can alter its physical form to appear as a unique human (see "Change Shape," MM2 216).

Resist 20 force 		Init +11 | AP 2 | Save +5
AC 29Fort 26Ref 24Will 27

Cha 24 (+14)
Languages Common, Draconic
Alignment Unaligned

Passive Perception 21 | Insight 26
